comments.body: @srowen - I've set `days-before-close` to 0, which in theory means the PR will be closed immediately after it crosses the stale threshold. However, due to the linked issue, this will in practice close the PR 1 day after tagging it as stale and posting the message.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +21,25 @@        # Setting this to 0 is the same as setting it to 1.
        # See: https://github.com/actions/stale/issues/28
        days-before-close: 0
